data.title: These Women Have Faced Only Pain, Help Pooja Sharma To Build A New Home For Them
data.text:
Project:

In a world where the marginalized often go unnoticed, Pooja Sharma stands as a beacon of hope and compassion. She has dedicated her life to an extraordinary mission: cremating unidentified bodies with dignity and providing a safe haven for abandoned women and children, many of whom are grappling with severe illnesses or are victims of horrific crimes.

Pooja’s journey began with a deep-seated empathy for the deceased who had no one to claim their bodies. These unidentified individuals, often forgotten and ignored, found in Pooja someone who would ensure they received a dignified farewell. Pooja took it upon herself to perform the cremations, a task often fraught with societal stigma and emotional burden. Yet, she persevered, driven by her unwavering belief that every human being deserves respect in death.

Parallel to her work with the deceased, Pooja also manages an old age home that provides shelter to women and children who have been abandoned by their families. These residents include women suffering from HIV, cancer, and those who have endured the trauma of rape. The old age home is more than just a refuge; it is a place of healing, love, and support. Here, Pooja and her dedicated team work tirelessly to provide not only the basic necessities of life but also medical care, emotional support, and a sense of community to those who need it the most.

Recognizing the growing need for space and resources, Pooja is now spearheading an ambitious project to build a larger shelter home. This new facility aims to provide a more comfortable and supportive environment for the women and children under her care. However, the construction of this new shelter requires substantial resources. Pooja is calling upon the community and compassionate individuals like you to help make this vision a reality.

The new shelter will require construction materials, medical beds, ration supplies, and various other necessities to ensure that the residents can live in dignity and comfort. Your support is crucial in bringing this project to fruition. By contributing to this noble cause, you will be directly impacting the lives of countless women and children, providing them with the care and shelter they desperately need.

Pooja Sharma’s work is a testament to the power of compassion and dedication. Her efforts have transformed the lives of many, offering hope and a second chance to those who have been neglected by society. The construction of the new shelter home is not just a building project; it is a beacon of hope for the future, a symbol of what can be achieved when we come together to support those in need.

Your contribution, no matter how small, can make a significant difference. Together, we can help Pooja Sharma continue her incredible work and ensure that the new shelter home is constructed as soon as possible. Let us join hands and support Pooja in her mission to provide a safe, loving, and dignified environment for the abandoned women and children who need it the most.
